title: Resizing objects in GUI causes crash

content.raw: When I open a basic instance of Gazebo and put in a cube, sphere, or cylinder, I can't edit the geometry in the GUI and have it update.  Possibly related to the current issue of duplicate 'visual' SDF tags, when I go in and change the geometry parameters, either Gazebo crashes or no change happens.  If I then click on another item and then back, it isn't storing the change in the geometry parameters.
